snippet: A U.S. judge on Wednesday briefly delayed the upcoming trial of a son in law of Osama bin Laden on terrorism-related charges so his lawyers could submit written questions to accused September 11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed....

headline.print_headline: Bin Laden Son-In-Law's Lawyers May Question Accused 9/11 Mastermind
headline.main: Bin Laden Son-In-Law's Lawyers May Question Accused 9/11 Mastermind

lead_paragraph: A U.S. judge on Wednesday briefly delayed the upcoming trial of a son in law of Osama bin Laden on terrorism-related charges so his lawyers could submit written questions to accused September 11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed.
